name: Endless Runner!
description:
This is Endless runner. You are being chased by a monster. Try to avoid the bombs so that you don't lose your life.

Controls:
  • Use “ ↑ or ↓” to move up and down.
Credits and Resources: 1. Parallax Background: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-parallax-2d-backgrounds  2. Tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g?view_as=subscriber  3. Sound: https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-categories/  4. Music: https://www.playonloop.com/ 5. Main Enemy: https://bevouliin.com/free-2d-game-asset-pink-monster-game-character/
